entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 8:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Blowing snow over the Highlands early this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning near midnight except flurries over the Highlands. Fog patches overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over the Highlands. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
